channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- All Qualcomm products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- All Qualcomm products

item.title: CVE-2015-9062|2024-09-16T17:27:43.818Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, an integer overflow to buffer overflow vulnerability exists when loading an ELF file.

item.title: CVE-2016-5871|2024-09-16T17:04:08.260Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, an integer overflow to buffer overflow vulnerability exists when loading an image file.

item.title: CVE-2015-9049|2024-09-16T16:18:46.443Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a vulnerability exists in the processing of certain responses from the USIM.

item.title: CVE-2015-9047|2024-09-16T16:33:45.871Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a vulnerability exists in GNSS when performing a scan after bootup.

item.title: CVE-2015-9046|2024-09-16T17:32:57.106Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a vulnerability exists in LTE where an assertion can be reached due to an improper bound on the size of a frequency list.

item.title: CVE-2017-8259|2024-09-16T16:32:39.999Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In the service locator in all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a buffer overflow can occur as the variable set for determining the size of the buffer is not used to indicate the size of the buffer.

item.title: CVE-2015-9068|2024-09-16T16:22:43.305Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, an argument to a mink syscall is not properly validated.

item.title: CVE-2017-8253|2024-09-16T17:15:16.073Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, kernel memory can potentially be overwritten if an invalid master is sent from userspace.

item.title: CVE-2015-8592|2024-09-16T16:48:54.071Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- all%20qualcomm%20products
item.description: In all Qualcomm products with Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, a pointer is not validated prior to being dereferenced potentially resulting in Guest-OS memory corruption.
